title: HELP, Unlocked ward from capsule and don't see it anywhere.
body:
I just unlocked a Ward from Capsule and I can't find it anywhere. please help. 
not much to say.

Thanks.
Pxsuns

replies.body: I can see that dark star ward shard on my end in your loot. You should be able to click in there and then scroll down to see it depending on how much inventory you have. Let me know if you're not seeing it anywhere at all with a screenshot!
